page.title: 02WESTHOUGHTON SCHOOLS
page.content: Children are{admitted}to primary school at the beginning of the school year in which they have their fifth birthday(there is one nursery unit which takes children from the age of three on a part-time basis initially). Pupils transfer to{secondary education at 11+. Since the{Education Act 1980}there have been changes in the composition of{Governing Bodies}.These are now much enlarged and include representatives of{ {parents,teachers,local education {authority,and (for church {schools)representatives of the diocese {and the parish church council_}with the Minister usually acting as Chairman.
